{{cpp/experimental/ostream_joiner/title|ostream_joiner}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib extensions 2/ostream_joiner/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=libfund_ts_2|1=
ostream_joiner( ostream_type&amp; stream, const DelimT&amp; delimiter );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=libfund_ts_2|1=
ostream_joiner( ostream_type&amp; stream, DelimT&amp;&amp; delimiter );
}}
{{dcl|num=3|since=libfund_ts_2|notes={{mark implicit}}|1=
ostream_joiner( const ostream_joiner&amp; other ) = default;
}}
{{dcl|num=4|since=libfund_ts_2|notes={{mark implicit}}|1=
ostream_joiner( ostream_joiner&amp;&amp; other ) = default;
}}
{{dcl end}}

@1@ Constructs the iterator with the private {{c|ostream_type*}} member initialized with {{c|std::addressof(stream)}}, the private delimiter member initialized with {{c|delimiter}}, and the private "first element" flag set to {{c|true}}.

@2@ Constructs the iterator with the private {{c|ostream_type*}} member initialized with {{c|std::addressof(stream)}}, the private delimiter member initialized with {{tt|std::move(delimiter)}}, and the private "first element" flag set to {{c|true}}.

@3,4@ Implicitly declared copy/move constructor that copy/move constructs the private stream pointer, delimiter, and "first element" flag members.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|stream|the output stream to be accessed by this iterator}}
{{par|delimiter|the delimiter to be inserted into the stream in between two outputs}}
{{par|other|the {{tt|ostream_joiner}} object from which this object is to be copy- or move-constructed}}
{{par end}}
